name: Icy Fruits
description:
Icy Fruits is a elimination game where you break groups of 3 or more ice blocks with same fruit. Breaking as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Try to tap fruit with star on it which will bring you special benefits. Gear up for this exciting and addictive game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

-Fun of ice breaking.
-Very cute HD graphics.
-High quality sound effects.
-Game Center leaderboards.
-Endless game.
-Mindless fun must have.
-Great way to pass time.
